channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rory McIlroy: How moving from Florida to the U.K. has changed his golf game
item.description: The pro golfer and his family quit their $18 million Florida mansion to relocate to the U.K., and it appears that the move was exactly what the doctor...

item.title: U.S. stock futures slip after Trump’s latest tariff threats; bitcoin hits new high
item.description: U.S. stock futures fell Sunday, a day after President Donald Trump threatened to impose new 30% tariffs against imports from Mexico and the European U...

item.title: Gene Simmons snapped up an eco-friendly luxury $25 million Malibu mansion before listing Beverly Hills home
item.description: The KISS rocker picked up the “one-of-a-kind” estate in September. It has 6 bedrooms, 9 baths and sweeping views of the ocean.

item.title: What the stock market is understanding that the bond market is not
item.description: The market is wrong to expect a rate cut in September, says Citadel Securities

item.title: It’s ‘crypto week’ and bitcoin is flying higher, passing $120,000

item.title: Stop vetting engineers like it’s 2021 — the AI-native workforce has arrived
item.description: Jobs will fade and rise due to AI. But those who learn to screen, train and build dev teams around AI-enabled talent will write the future.

item.title: The human harbor: Navigating identity and meaning in the AI age
item.description: The future is marked by deepening uncertainty about our place in it, and by growing ambiguity about the nature of human purpose itself.

item.title: Pharm Robotics advances automated dairy cow healthcare

item.title: Building voice AI that listens to everyone: Transfer learning and synthetic speech in action
item.description: Enterprises adopting voice AI must consider not just usability, but inclusion. Supporting users with disabilities is a market opportunity.

item.title: A new paradigm for AI: How ‘thinking as optimization’ leads to better general-purpose models
item.description: A new AI model learns to "think" longer on hard problems, achieving more robust reasoning and better generalization to novel, unseen tasks.
